action_item: Topics - Discuss the billing process in Dr. Cloud EHR including claims creation and marking claims as billed.
notes: Focus on the steps for generating claims and the options for marking them as billed without sending to a clearinghouse.

action_item: Requirements - Gather requirements for sending encounters to Medicaid authority for reporting.
notes: Clarify the formatting and data needed for Medicaid reporting.

action_item: Reports - Create a month-end closed report for the general ledger.
notes: Ensure the report captures all necessary financial data.

action_item: Service Codes - Update the master charge list and rate tables in Dr. Cloud EHR.
notes: Make necessary changes to service codes and their billing methods.

action_item: Payers - Manage contracts with payers and update contracted rates.
notes: Ensure that the contracted rates are accurately reflected in the system.

action_item: Users & Roles - Set up billing rules based on service codes and patient demographics.
notes: Implement rules that adjust billing based on age, diagnosis, and service type.

action_item: Data Migration - Ensure proper handling of prior authorizations and authorized units.
notes: Set up the system to manage authorized units effectively.

action_item: Interface - Implement a feature to display authorization information during appointment creation.
notes: Allow users to see authorized units consumed when creating appointments.

action_item: Topics - Discuss the process for placing clients with collection agencies.
notes: Review the collections aging report and the steps to initiate collections.

action_item: Reports - Generate net revenue reports based on contracted rates.
notes: Ensure the report provides a clear comparison of expected revenue versus actual payments.
